thread.section_title: LensFactory Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LensFactory | lensfactory.com
thread.title: Edward

author: Edward
title: Edward
text: The great quality of the lenses plus the excellent communication, (not to mention the price) were all first rate. This way my first time doing something like this by mail and I appreciated that the company e.mailed me when they had a problem with my frames but let me know right away that it would only take a little longer for them to fill the order. I spoke with someone over the phone and they were easy to reach and talk to. When they arrived I tried them on and the fit was perfect. I already have plans to order my next pair of lenses through LensFactory. Thanks for the great work.
